mapper.sql: and TO_CHAR(weatherDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') between TO_CHAR(sysdate - (INTERVAL '24' HOUR), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') and TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI')
mapper.select: select weatherdataNum, weatherTemperature, weatherHumidity, weatherPressure, TO_CHAR(weatherDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as weatherDate from weather where TO_CHAR(weatherDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') between TO_CHAR(sysdate - (INTERVAL '24' HOUR), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') and TO_CHAR(sysdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') order by weatherDate asc

select weatherdataNum, weatherTemperature, weatherHumidity, weatherPressure, TO_CHAR(weatherDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as weatherDate from weather where weatherdataNum is not null
order by weatherDate asc
